name: Dragon Claw
text: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 15 or more cards in your trash, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

effect.text: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 15 or more cards in your trash, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

meta.notes: Card is marked as a SAMPLE, but the printed ID, set, number, and rarity are used as per the system prompt. The Counter value is 4000 as printed.
